verses.verse: Elihu <WH453> also proceeded <WH3254> <WH8686>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>,
Suffer <WH3803> <WH8761> me a little <WH2191>, and I will shew <WH2331> <WH8762> thee that I have yet to speak <WH4405> on 'Elohim's <WH433> behalf.
I will fetch <WH5375> <WH8799> my knowledge <WH1843> from afar <WH7350>, and will ascribe <WH5414> <WH8799> righteousness <WH6664> to my Maker <WH6466> <WH8802>.
For truly <WH551> my words <WH4405> shall not be false <WH8267>: he that is perfect <WH8549> in knowledge <WH1844> is with thee.
Behold, 'Elohim <WH410> is mighty <WH3524>, and despiseht <WH3988> <WH8799> not any: he is mighty <WH3524> in strength <WH3581> and wisdom <WH3820>.
He preserveth not the life <WH2421> <WH8762> of the wicked <WH7563>: but giveth <WH5414> <WH8799> right <WH4941> to the poor <WH6041>.

He withdraweth <WH1639> <WH8799> not his eyes <WH5869> from the righteous <WH6662>: but with kings <WH4428> are they on the throne <WH3678>; yea, he doth establish <WH3427> <WH8686> them for ever <WH5331>, and they are exalted <WH1361> <WH8799>.
And if they be bound <WH631> <WH8803> in fetters <WH2131>, and be holden <WH3920> <WH8735> in cords <WH2256> of affliction <WH6040>;
Then he sheweth <WH5046> <WH8686> them their work <WH6467>, and their transgressions <WH6588> that they have exceeded <WH1396> <WH8691>.
He openeth <WH1540> <WH8799> also their ear <WH241> to discipline <WH4148>, and commandeth <WH559> <WH8799> that they return <WH7725> <WH8799> from iniquity <WH205>.
If they obey <WH8085> <WH8799> and serve <WH5647> <WH8799> him, they shall spend <WH3615> <WH8762> their days <WH3117> in prosperity <WH2896>, and their years <WH8141> in pleasures <WH5273>.
But if they obey <WH8085> <WH8799> not, they shall perish <WH5674> <WH8799> by the sword <WH7973>, and they shall die <WH1478> <WH8799> without knowledge <WH1847>.
But the hypocrites <WH2611> in heart <WH3820> heap up <WH7760> <WH8799> wrath <WH639>: they cry <WH7768> <WH8762> not when he bindeth <WH631> <WH8804> them.
They <WH5315> die <WH4191> <WH8799> in youth <WH5290>, and their life <WH2416> is among the unclean <WH6945>.
He delivereth <WH2502> <WH8762> the poor <WH6041> in his affliction <WH6040>, and openeth <WH1540> <WH8799> their ears <WH241> in oppression <WH3906>.

Havahn so would he have removed <WH5496> <WH8689> thee out of the strait <WH6310> <WH6862> into a broad place <WH7338>, where <WH8478> there is no straitness <WH4164>; and that which should be set <WH5183> on thy table <WH7979> should be full <WH4390> <WH8804> of fatness <WH1880>.
But thou hast fulfilled <WH4390> <WH8804> the judgment <WH1779> of the wicked <WH7563>: judgment <WH1779> and justice <WH4941> take hold <WH8551> <WH8799> on thee.
Because there is wrath <WH2534>, beware lest he take thee away <WH5496> <WH8686> with his stroke <WH5607>: then a great <WH7230> ransom <WH3724> cannot deliver <WH5186> <WH8686> thee.
Will he esteem <WH6186> <WH8799> thy riches <WH7769>? no, not gold <WH1222>, nor all the forces <WH3981> of strength <WH3581>.
Desire <WH7602> <WH8799> not the night <WH3915>, when people <WH5971> are cut off <WH5927> <WH8800> in their place.
Take heed <WH8104> <WH8734>, regard <WH6437> <WH8799> not iniquity <WH205>: for this hast thou chosen <WH977> <WH8804> rather than affliction <WH6040>.
Behold, 'Elohim <WH410> exalteth <WH7682> <WH8686> by his power <WH3581>: who teacheth <WH3384> <WH8688> like him?
Who hath enjoined <WH6485> <WH8804> him his way <WH1870>? or who can say <WH559> <WH8804>, Thou hast wrought <WH6466> <WH8804> iniquity <WH5766> ?
Remember <WH2142> <WH8798> that thou magnify <WH7679> <WH8686> his work <WH6467>, which men <WH582> behold <WH7891> <WH8790>.
Havahry man <WH120> may see <WH2372> <WH8804> it; man <WH582> may behold <WH5027> <WH8686> it afar off <WH7350>.
Behold, 'Elohim <WH410> is great <WH7689>, and we know <WH3045> <WH8799> him not, neither can the number <WH4557> of his years <WH8141> be searched out <WH2714>.
For he maketh small <WH1639> <WH8762> the drops <WH5198> of water <WH4325>: they pour down <WH2212> <WH8799> rain <WH4306> according to the vapour <WH108> thereof:
Which the clouds <WH7834> do drop <WH5140> <WH8799> and distil <WH7491> <WH8799> upon man <WH120> abundantly <WH7227>.
Also can any understand <WH995> <WH8799> the spreadings <WH4666> of the clouds <WH5645>, or the noise <WH8663> of his tabernacle <WH5521> ?
Behold, he spreadeth <WH6566> <WH8804> his light <WH216> upon it, and covereth <WH3680> <WH8765> the bottom <WH8328> of the sea <WH3220>.
For by them judgeth <WH1777> <WH8799> he the people <WH5971>; he giveth <WH5414> <WH8799> meat <WH400> in abundance <WH4342> <WH8688>.
With clouds <WH3709> he covereth <WH3680> <WH8765> the light <WH216>; and commandeth <WH6680> <WH8762> it not to shine by the cloud that cometh betwixt <WH6293> <WH8688>.
The noise <WH7452> thereof sheweth <WH5046> <WH8686> concerning it, the cattle <WH4735> also concerning the vapour <WH5927> <WH8802>.
